questions.question: Does the edited image feature a horse in the original pose as the protagonist?
questions.explanation: In Image B, there is a horse prominently featured in a standing position in the center of the image. This suggests that the horse is the main subject or protagonist of the image. The horse is placed in a way that draws immediate attention, indicating its significance in the image.

questions.question: Is the background set in a post-apocalyptic ruined city?
questions.explanation: Image B showcases a scene with dilapidated buildings and debris on the ground, suggesting a setting that resembles a post-apocalyptic city. The atmosphere is dark and somber, contributing to the impression of a desolate and abandoned environment.

questions.question: Does the title "LAST RIDE" appear at the top of the image with a cool-tone filter?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the title 'LAST RIDE' is clearly positioned at the top of the image. The text appears with a color palette that includes shades of blue and green, which are typically considered cool-tone colors. This gives the title a cool-tone filter appearance.

questions.question: Is there a film rating label present in the edited image?
questions.explanation: In the bottom left corner of Image B, there is a label that resembles an advisory or rating label, as often seen in movie posters or album covers. This label suggests guidance regarding the content, akin to film ratings.

questions.question: Has the entire image been filtered with a cool tone?
questions.explanation: Image B overall exhibits colors dominated by blues and greens, casting a cool tone across the entire scene. This color palette contributes to the overall atmosphere, emphasizing a moody and somber environment.
